description: A semiconductor fabrication plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules. The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify potential issues and suggest preventative measures.  The goal is to minimize downtime and improve overall equipment effectiveness (OEE).
initial_goal: Maximize OEE of the wafer fabrication facility by predicting and preventing equipment failures using sensor data and historical maintenance records.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a wafer fabrication plant)
